channel.title: Delta Changing worlds

item.title: Delta Changing worlds
item.dc:creator: @nicke924 nicke924
item.description:
@nicke924 wrote:

Ok, So I recently played a server and in it’s client you can change World.

^ pic.
So my question is how can I add that into my client?:s
I found this ;
JButton world1 = new JButton(“World 1”);
world1.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent event) {
serverString = “example-no-ip.info”;
}
});

Thank you ,please help

Read full topic
